ingrid.topologies.sf135 module¶

SF135.py

Description:

SF135 configuration class.

Created: June 18, 2020

class ingrid.topologies.sf135.SF135(Ingrid_obj, config)¶

Bases: utils.topology_utils.Topology

AdjustPatch(patch)¶
GroupPatches()¶
OrderPatches()¶
construct_patches()¶

Draws lines and creates patches for both USN and LSN configurations.

Patch Labeling Key:

I: Inner, O: Outer, DL: Divertor Leg, PF: Private Flux, T: Top, B: Bottom, S: Scrape Off Layer, C: Core.

ingrid.topologies.snl module¶

SNL.py

Description:

SNL configuration class.

Created: June 18, 2020

class ingrid.topologies.snl.SNL(Ingrid_obj, config)¶

Bases: utils.topology_utils.Topology

The SNL (Single-Null) class is the parent class for both upper-single null (USN) and lower-single null (LSN) configurations. This base class handles the formatting and plotting of data obtained from an LSN or USN object. Parameter:

  • INGRID_object : Ingrid class object

All SNL objects are children of the main Ingrid class. INGRID_object provides information such as YAML data, efit_psi, psi_norm, and PlateData.

@author: garcia299

AdjustPatch(patch)¶
GroupPatches()¶
OrderPatches()¶
construct_patches()¶

Draws lines and creates patches for both USN and LSN configurations.

Patch Labeling Key:

I: Inner, O: Outer, DL: Divertor Leg, PF: Private Flux, T: Top, B: Bottom, S: Scrape Off Layer, C: Core.

set_gridue()¶

Prepare the relevant arrays for writing to GRIDUE.
